data.title: Sysco puts AI at the center of its sales rebound in Q1
data.description: The AI360 rollout marks the next phase of Sysco’s broader digital transformation, which includes pricing agility tools, supply chain automation and a revamped loyalty program for its most active restaurant customers.

data.title: AI data center boom, digital sales drive Wesco Q3 revenue growth
data.description: All three business units are now running early versions of the company’s new digital platform, which Wesco designed to streamline pricing, procurement and project management across global operations.

data.title: Mastercard: “Agentic commerce is here”
data.description: The company’s message was clear: autonomous shopping isn’t a far-off concept. It’s live on the Mastercard network, with expansion coming fast.

data.title: Walmart debuts new AI features in its app for the holiday season
data.description: The new AI features, which extend to discovery use cases and augmented reality for Walmart customers are scheduled to begin going live on Nov. 1.

data.title: Ecommerce Trends: 5 things holiday shopping forecasts show so far
data.description: While major online holiday sales forecasts see growth ahead, important shifts may drive changes for retailers.
